titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to provide cost share assistance for projects designed to improve the supply of water in rural areas that are experiencing severe problems with the quality or quantity of water.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment, Credit and Rural Development.

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act to authorize Federal cost share assistance for rural water supply projects in communities or areas experiencing severe water quality or quantity problems.
